author: Harry Craddock
description: One man's 'dash' is another's 'splash'. At least that's how I've interpreted the amount of vermouth in this spirit-forward heavily calvados-influenced sipping cocktail. Would also suit being served over a large cube or chunk of block ice.
name: Kicker
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
